patch 8.1.2025: MS-Windows: Including shlguid.h causes problems for msys2

Problem:    MS-Windows: Including shlguid.h causes problems for msys2.
Solution:   Do not include shlguid.h. (closes #4913)

attachments.text:
patch 8.1.2025: MS-Windows: Including shlguid.h causes problems for msys2

Problem:    MS-Windows: Including shlguid.h causes problems for msys2.
Solution:   Do not include shlguid.h. (closes #4913)
